amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section which amends section 204 of the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 regarding investment adviser fees by the SEC.

action.text: Mr. Crenshaw raised a point of order against the Waters amendment (A018). Mr. Crenshaw stated that the provisions of the Waters amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
